content.description: Basic understanding of if condition (2017 Fall, Quest, Question 5)

p.line: If the output from _BOLDS_Mystery_BOLDE_ is _BOLDS_true_BOLDE_, which can you say for sure?
A must be true, B must be true
A must be true, B must be false
A must be false, B must be true
A must be false, B must be false

content.hint: you can try it in Snap!
